entity_dsra.note: Each entity maintains DSRA = 1x next IC (P+I)

holding_priority.name: sr_pi
holding_priority.desc: Senior P+I (pass-through to IIC, Senior character)

holding_priority.name: mz_pi
holding_priority.desc: Mezz P+I + Entity Accel (pass-through to CC, Mezz character)

holding_priority.name: sr_accel
holding_priority.desc: Senior acceleration (IIC prepayment from free surplus)

holding_dsra.note: Holding DSRA sized on Senior P+I only (not Mezz)

ic_overdraft.note: Auto when entity deficit, repaid from entity surplus

cc_irr.note: Track per year: CC_balance x 5.25% = accruing liability. Also verify via IRR solver.

nwl_swap.eur_leg_note: Auto-computed: IC Senior P+I at M24 + M30
nwl_swap.zar_end_note: Auto-computed: matches last NWL IC Senior repayment month
